title: Coming for the Ring (3C51)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Regroup: Reveal a card at random from the Free Peoples player's hand. Heal X [Isengard] minions, where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
Lore:	”'This evil cannot be concealed by the power of the Elves….'”
Rarity:	C
